title: My Context Window
text:
Hi, I am Shivam Miglani
I build AI/ML systems and ship them to production.
GenAI today feels like early deep learning: raw potential hitting the messy reality of deployment. The challenge isn’t “can an LLM do this?” but “can we make it reliable, observable, and affordable at scale?” That’s where I operate.
This is my learning space—intuition and code-first.


What I Write About
This blog is my scratchpad for full-stack GenAI engineering, focused on:

LLMs & Prompting: Making them work in production without breaking the bank
RAG Systems: Patterns that actually work, not just demo well
Evals: Measuring if your AI system is actually good
Agents: Composable intelligence blocks, not magic wizards
Papers & Case Studies: What research looks like when you implement it



Why This Space?
I believe the best way to learn is to strip away the abstractions and build things from first principles. I hope the intuitions I write about are useful to you.
